Hi Jonathan,

Congratulations on the new location.

Chris here jumping in on behalf of Heath and Joel.

Please note that we took your instructions of going live before 5 pm on the 30th as the most recent request. The location has been added to the following pages: 
https://johnnygiospizza.com.au/
https://johnnygiospizza.com.au/our-locations/

We have used a holding image until you can provide an updated photo. Please let us know if you would like the new location positioned higher up the order on either your home or locations page. 

Please review and let us know of any further changes.

@glen 

Title location to be "Dulwich Hill - Opens 30th April 2024" 

1. page: https://johnnygiospizza.com.au/ add new location tile to section where space is available
- Copy map embed from others using the new address. 
- remember to set up any click to call, click to directions links etc. 

2. Add the new address to the footer in the space available 

3. https://johnnygiospizza.com.au/our-locations/ - Add the new address to the space available. 
- use this image: https://johnnygiospizza.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/johnny-gios-pizza-kirrawee-location-img.jpg
- copy any styling elements from previous examples.
Sure thing @heath, next on the list.
@chris Can you please manage this one and liaise with Jonathan.

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

We have a new venue opening 5pm Tuesday 30th April.

Johnny Gio's Pizza Dulwich Hill.

Address: 497 Marrickville rd Dulwich Hill
Phone: 02 9599 7411

Can you please update website etc. for all to go live on Tuesday.


Kind Regards,






65 Bondi Rd Bondi, NSW 2026
